Platform
[Deployment](\docs\platform\deployment)
[Cloud Providers](\docs\deploy\vercel)

Providers' Usage Limits
As your functions' code runs on the hosting provider of your choice, you will be subject to provider or billing plan
limits separate from
[Inngest's own limits](\docs\usage-limits\inngest)
.
Here are the known usage limits for each provider we support based on their documentation.
AWS Lambda, Payload size = 6MB - 20MB. AWS Lambda, Concurrency = 1000. AWS Lambda, Timeout = 15m. Google Cloud Functions, Payload size = 512KB - 32MB. Google Cloud Functions, Concurrency = 3000 (1st gen only). Google Cloud Functions, Timeout = 10m - 60m. Cloudflare Workers, Payload size = 100MB - 500MB. Cloudflare Workers, Concurrency = 100 - 500. Cloudflare Workers, Timeout = N/A. Vercel, Payload size = 4MB - 4.5MB. Vercel, Concurrency = 1000. Vercel, Timeout = 10s - 900s, N/A (Edge Fn). Netlify, Payload size = 256KB - 6MB. Netlify, Concurrency = Undocumented. Netlify, Timeout = 10s - 15m. DigitalOcean, Payload size = 1MB. DigitalOcean, Concurrency = 120. DigitalOcean, Timeout = 15m. Fly.io, Payload size = Undocumented. Fly.io, Concurrency = User configured. Fly.io, Timeout = Undocumented
For more details tailored to your plan, please check each provider's website.
